channel.title: Antiban Procedures and Functions
channel.description:
We should have 1 section dedicated to antiban. This would be usefull for ALL scripter. We could go there and shove some of the antiban procdres in our sripts (and givecredit to authors of course)
I think it would be prety useful

item.title: Antiban Procedures and Functions
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

[quote=“yohojo, post:3, topic:7255”]Who is maintaing it?
What do they still need in it?
Is it still even beng worked on?
And why dont they want more antiban? (You can NEVER have enough antiban proceres)[/quote]

Dankness, and Wizzup? are the new leaders.

Some of the randoms are outdated, if you get one see if SRL can solve it. If not, try and solve it yourself.

Yes, its still being worked on. We are moving forums soon I think.

If you want more Antiban procedures you can do it script-side. Its just that there are so many different Anti-ban procedures that it is starting to waste space, because a lot of them are not being put to use.

Read full topic
